name: Bunnycake
description:
In the middle of Cakeland Major's wedding party, the evil Monsieur Balloon appeared and kidnapped the bride and groom! The people of Cakeland are begging for Bunnycake's help, and its his job to rescue the kidnapped, defeat Monsieur Balloon and save the wedding. Go Bunny!

CONTROLS:

  • Left and right buttons - Walk
  • B button (X key by default) - Jump
  • A button (Z key by default) - Shoot (requires cakegun)
    • A button while holding up button - Fly (requires cakecopter)
    • A button while holding down button - Dash (requires cakeppelin)

NOTE:

Also, you can play it here.
